channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Mystery of the One-Legged Man
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (J. B. Hawley)
item.description: Newspaper readers will recall the series of brutal and seemingly senseless murders that occurred in England and were attributed to a criminal whom some clever writer dubbed Peg-Leg ... a mysterious one-legged man or a clever killer?
